DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy electrotherapy coadjuvant mobility exercise treatment reduction pain intensity subacromial impingement syndrome .
DOC.detailed_description: Among different diagnosis cover concept shoulder pain , common subacromial impingement syndrome , represent 44 % -60 % total.Specific supervise exercise obtain improvement range movement muscular function restore shoulder 's mobility stability . Physiotherapeutic option include several electrotherapy technique . Ultrasound beneficial exercise alone . Likewise , result recent study evaluate application ultrasound alone versus placebo , show ultrasound alone physiotherapy treatment shoulder pain effective patient calcific tendonitis shoulder . All author , however , suggest effectiveness vary , depend application condition , dosage timing . The primary objective trial analyze efficacy electrotherapy treatment ( monopolar radiofrequency ultrasound ) coadjuvant mobility exercise therapy reduction pain intensity subacromial impingement syndrome . The secondary objective study determine difference three intervention group : monopolar radiofrequency , ultrasound inactive radiofrequency , improvement performance status , quality life global impression improvement .
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 year age Shoulder pain secondary subacromial impingement syndrome Pain rest and/or free movement and/or movement resistance score visual analogue scale 3 high . Documented Xray ( XR ) , ultrasound ( US ) and/or magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) evidence cuff injury involve oedema , tendonitis , fibrosis torn tendon . Potentially available next six month . Documented US and/or MRI evidence complete tear cuff clinical inability lift arm ( drop arm sign ) Radiological finding tumour lesion , avascular necrosis , glenoid development defect , acromial bone , severe degenerative sign affect interarticular space fracture Limited range passive movement capsular pattern Recent history trauma ( contusion , fall sudden jarring ) Ischaemic cardiopathy subacute phase History five infiltration and/or shoulder surgery History rehabilitation treatment reason last 12 month Cognitive deficit , psychiatric alteration behavioural disorder might compromise patient 's collaboration Unsuitable electrotherapy : pregnancy , epilepsy , pacemaker , osteosynthesis , undergo treatment Sintrom Patients litigation process making workrelated claim Failure understand Spanish
